name: Hellbound (itch) (ChewieCB)
description:
Originally developed for Ludum Dare 47 (Stuck In A Loop) but unfinished during the jam, fixed up occasionally over a few months and now I'm uploading it proper for posterity now.

Hellbound is a game about keeping a demon bound with chains (stuck in a loop of chains, if you will), the demon will quickly break free of the chains one by one so you must quickly cast as many Bind spells as you can to chain it back up before it can escape.

Controls

  • Press 1 to bring up the Bind spell
  • Press the arrow keys to input the spell runes to cast Bind and trap the demon
  • M to toggle music
